Name: Bitter in Brazil
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably large chunk of block ice).
Review: Cachaça based and bittersweet with orange accents and Fernet Branca contributing subtle bitterness.
History: Adapted from a recipe created at The Citizen Wine Bar, Worcester, Massachusetts, USA.
